text: Zarbeg Beriashvili (10 September 1939 - 22 April 2020) was a Georgian wrestler.გარდაიცვალა ლეგენდარული ქართველი მოჭიდავე, ზარიბეგ ბერიაშვილი He competed at the 1964 Summer Olympics and the 1968 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1939 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Male sport wrestlers from Georgia (country) Category:Soviet male sport wrestlers Category:Olympic wrestlers of the Soviet Union Category:Wrestlers at the 1964 Summer Olympics Category:Wrestlers at the 1968 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Tbilisi Category:Honoured Masters of Sport of the USSR
title: Zarbeg Beriashvili
